title: Defending the Keep (5C6)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to Draw a card or play a [Dwarven] condition from your discard pile.
Lore:	”'I have fought many wars, master Dwarf. I know how to defend my own Keep.'”
Rarity:	C
